pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.flavorText: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.flavorText: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.flavorText: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.flavorText: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.flavorText: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.flavorText: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.flavorText: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

pokemon.name: Farfetchd
pokemon.flavorText: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.flavorText: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.flavorText: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.flavorText: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.flavorText: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.flavorText: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.flavorText: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.flavorText: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.flavorText: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.flavorText: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.flavorText: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.flavorText: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.flavorText: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.flavorText: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.flavorText: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.flavorText: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

pokemon.name: Kingler
pokemon.flavorText: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.flavorText: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.
